data.title: Verizon Adds BBC AMERICA HD to FiOS TV Lineup
data.meta_description: Verizon and BBC AMERICA announced on Thursday (Aug. 16) that the channel is now available in high definition on FiOS TV on Channel 689.Â  BBC AMER
data.text:
Verizon and BBC AMERICA announced on Thursday (Aug. 16) that the channel is now available in high definition on FiOS TV on Channel 689. BBC AMERICA, an award-winning channel that recently received five Emmy nominations, features the best in thought-provoking British programming and innovative home-grown original series that embrace the intersection of U.S. and U.K. culture.

"We are thrilled that we are now able to make BBC AMERICA HD a part of our FiOS TV lineup," said Terry Denson, vice president of content strategy and acquisition for Verizon. "Fans of BBC AMERICA will now be able to enjoy their favorite programming in HD via FiOS TV's 100 percent fiber-optic network to the home."

Sandy Ashendorf, EVP network distribution, BBC Worldwide, America, said, "We're excited that FiOS TV customers are now able to enjoy BBC AMERICA programs in HD. With the series premiere of our first original drama, 'COPPER,' on Aug. 19 and new seasons of 'Doctor Who' and 'The Hour' around the corner, the timing for the launch of BBC AMERICA HD on FiOS TV couldn't be better."

Found on Channel 689, BBC AMERICA HD is available in FiOS TV's Extreme HD and Ultimate HD packages. BBC AMERICA is already available in standard definition on FiOS TV Channel 189. Verizon also plans to add BBC AMERICA HD to its FiOS TV Video on Demand offering soon.

The HD launch on FiOS TV comes just in time for the start of BBC AMERICA's newest series, "COPPER," from Academy Award-winner Barry Levinson, Emmy-winner Tom Fontana and Academy Award-nominee Will Rokos. The series - a gripping drama set in 1864 New York City and filled with intrigue, corruption and mystery - premieres Sunday (Aug. 19) at10 p.m. ET/PT. Other popular shows include "Doctor Who," "Top Gear," "The Graham Norton Show" and Dramaville's acclaimed miniseries "The Hour" and "Luther," for which Idris Elba won a Golden Globe.

BBC AMERICA HD joins FiOS TV's broad collection of programming, which offers more than 560 all-digital channels, including more than 145 HD channels, and 35,000 monthly video-on-demand titles.

For the latest news, updates and information about FiOS TV, visit www.verizon.com/newscenter and http://www.verizon.com/athomeblog.

About BBC AMERICA

BBC AMERICA delivers US audiences high-quality, innovative and intelligent programming. Established in 1998, it has been the launch pad for talent embraced by American mainstream pop culture, including Ricky Gervais, Gordon Ramsay, Graham Norton, and successful programming formats including ground-breaking non-scripted television like Top Gear and top-rated science-fiction like Doctor Who. Owned by BBC Worldwide, the commercial arm of the BBC, BBC AMERICA has attracted both critical acclaim and major awards including an Emmy(r), five Golden Globes(r) and ten Peabody Awards. The channel attracts one of cable's most affluent and educated audiences and is available on digital cable and satellite TV in more than 79 million homes. It broadcasts in both standard and high-definition, with content available On Demand across all major digital platforms. Online, www.bbcamerica.com is the place to go to dig deeper into pop culture with a British twist. Find out more by visiting www.press.bbcamerica.com or follow us on www.twitter.com/bbcamerica.

About Verizon

Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE, Nasdaq: VZ), headquartered in New York, is a global leader in delivering broadband and other wireless and wireline communications services to consumer, business, government and wholesale customers. Verizon Wireless operates America's most reliable wireless network, with more than 94 million retail customers nationwide. Verizon also provides converged communications, information and entertainment services over America's most advanced fiber-optic network, and delivers integrated business solutions to customers in more than 150 countries, including all of the Fortune 500. A Dow 30 company with $111 billion in 2011 revenues, Verizon employs a diverse workforce of more than 188,000. For more information, visit www.verizon.com.
